relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
'Ring by Spring'. Seniors will often get married before they graduate.
Create your own events! Just make sure you let the Student Activities Board so they can help you put it on blast for anyone to know!
If you're a picky eater, maybe its not for you. Not very diverse food here, either.
Certain dorms have a great community feeling. You'll often find yourself in a friend's room next door.

The professors are very understanding if you accidentally missed class and would send powerpoints and notes to you if you need them. But don't slack off! There's lots of tutoring available and no one will judge you if you decide to take advantage of that.
Don't be afraid to take a stroll to town! There are many interesting places surrounding Eastern and you might even make friends from other colleges.

Eastern is very tolerant of other beliefs, despite being a Christian school. The professors are always here to help and you'll find students from around the world! Since the place is very old, it definitely gives off a pretty small village/castle feeling.
pageTitle: Eastern University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {83528=There is a big rock that any student is allowed to paint on. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Eastern has a very strong emphasis on their motto, faith, reason, and justice. Bang for the buck Eastern is a great school and has been called, one of the best Christian College educations money can buy. Am enjoying being here One of the best things about Eastern is that it is full of community. Am learning a lot These teachers don't just teach you what you need to learn, but open up your mind to whole new worlds. Login to rate or flag the reviews Leta from Herkimer, NY 01/06/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 39 Categories Comments Campus Safety Eastern's campus security is top of the line.
